GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
iio: adc: adi-axi-adc: Fix refcount leak in adi_axi_adc_attach_client

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 5eaa84e1605035a90a64d25b6cba79e89d188175, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit ef04070692a21633ec6a60f80c19b6af44b3cf47. For more details please see the references link.
